ygData.subject: Re: Amulet of Order
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I wasn t sure whether to send this to Beth privately or not, but decided many people might not know this... Wood elves CAN wear size medium.  Or small. Now
ygData.messageBody:
>
> I'm a wood elf. Those were the prices at the armor seller in the wood elf
> city. (AFTER I bought it, I realized that it was size Medium rather than
> size Small, so I lost about 250 plat selling it back again. OUCH! I
> finally found the size Small one in the Dwarf city.)

I wasn't sure whether to send this to Beth privately or not, but decided many
people might not know this...

Wood elves CAN wear size medium. Or small.

Now medium plate is a little heavier, so maybe that's why Beth sold it back,
but if the weight difference is worth 250 plat to you... wow, you're rich. :)

Jyzan
